cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, and I'm very bright. I'm not the moon, what am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm very far away!
🌟 I'm made of hot gas.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I'm big and round, and you live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have lots of water.
🌳 I have trees and plants.
🏠 You can build your house on me

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth every month, sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a crescent. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese
🌑 Sometimes you can not see me at all

cosmos.question: I'm very hot and bright, and the Earth goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you warmth.
☀️ I rise in the east.
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky, and known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me one day.
🏜️ I have big canyons.
🤖 Rovers explore me.

cosmos.question: I am made of many stars, gas and dust, all held together. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 My name sounds like a candy!
🌌 I am big and contain billions of stars
✨ Our solar system belongs to me

cosmos.question: I have rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very beautiful.
🪐 I am a very big planet.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them looks like animals.
✨ People use me to find direction.
📜 Ancient people gave me stories and names.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space, and when I get close to the sun, I grow a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from Earth
❄️ I am made of frozen gases
💨 My tail always points away from the sun

cosmos.question: I am a place where gravity is so strong that not even light can escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am like a cosmic vacuum cleaner.
🌌 I live in galaxies
⚫ I am invisible.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. Sometimes I come down in summer showers. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can make you wet.
⛱️ You might want an umbrella when I'm around.
☀️ I'm made of water, but I'm not the ocean.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow, and I shine so bright. I disappear when it gets dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you warmth.
😎 You need sunglasses when you look at me.
🌻 I help plants grow.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I melt when it gets warm.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am around.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make the leaves dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 I can help you fly a kite.
🌬️ I am made of air.

weather.question: I'm a big, white, fluffy thing that floats in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 Sometimes I look like a sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
💧 I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I come after the rain and I'm colorful and arched. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have seven colors.
☀️ You can only see me when the sun is out.
✨ I am a beautiful sight in the sky.

weather.question: I am very small balls of ice that fall from the sky. I'm not snow.

hints.text: 🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
🧊 I am frozen, but not a snowflake.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after a flash of light in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I follow lightning.
⛈️ I am part of a thunderstorm.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I'm a quick flash of bright light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I am followed by thunder.
🔦 I light up the sky for a second.
⚠️ It is not safe to be outside when I am around.

weather.question: I'm a swirling storm with strong winds and rain that forms over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a calm 'eye' in the middle.
🌊 I can cause big waves.
🏠 People prepare their houses before I arrive.
